#summary Installation Requirements

=Requirements=

==Software==

  * Python 2.5
  * A django-supported database: (tested with Postgresql + psycopg2 adapter, mysql)

==Python modules==

  * Django 1.1.0
  * Django-extensions 0.4.1
  * Django-registration 0.8
  * lxml (libxml2, libxslt c libraries also)
  * feedparser

==For Apache==
 
  * mod_wsgi
